page.title: 07ST.BREWARD CUBS AND SCOUTS
page.content:
IN 1975 CUB SCOUTS AND SCOUTS FIRST BEGAN IN ST.BREWARD, FOLLOWED SHORTLY BY BEAVERS AND VENTURE SCOUTS. THEY WORK FOR BADGES,SUCH AS HOME HELP,SPORTSMAN,HOBBIES,COLLECTORS AND PHOTOGRAPHER BADGE.
THEY SOMETIMES HAVE VISITS FROM PEOPLE LIKE THE COMMUNITY POLICEMAN AND ST. JOHNS AMBULANCE BRIGADE. THE GROUP ALSO ENJOY VISITS TO R.N.A.S. CULDROSE,R.A.F. ST.MAWGAN AND CUB CAMP AT NINEASHES NEAR BODMIN.
AT PACK MEETINGS THEY PLAY GAMES SUCH AS POISON, SNAKE, FOOTBALL, CRICKET, BUMPER CARS, COPS AND ROBBERS AND MY HOUSE.
ALTHOUGH PACKS ARE SMALL THEY ARE GROWING IN NUMBER AND ENTHUSIASM.
